fields.description: The level of approval that has been given to use the component version.
The combination of licenses to assign to the component version
The display status of the collection of licenses
Related licenses which follow the same structure as the license field
URL to the representation of the license to assign
The display status of the license
Related licenses which follow the same structure as the license field
Notes regarding the usage of this component version
Meta data associated with the representation, as described in <<metadata,Meta Data>>
The source of data for the component version.
The general identifier of the component version
Whether the version href followed was merged or split in the KnowledgeBase. If true, the href of the response will not match the href of the request
The date the version became available for use
Any additional web addresses containing information on various distributions of the component version

links.description: Resource listing versions associated with the component
Resource where more information on the component may be found
Resource representing the distribution origin(s) identified
Resource representing vulnerabilities associated with the component
Resource representing a medium version of the component's logo
Resource representing the component's custom fields
